content: Great. I've got the pro version. This app and others helped me raise my credit up around 200 points.
replyContent: Thank you Natasha.

content: Had trouble... But was resolved.
replyContent: Excellent!

content: Love this app but would really like for my husband to have it synced on his phone. Would also be great to have a running balance of bill being paid off. But this app has been a life saver for planning and budgeting. Thank you
replyContent: Thank you Liza. I'd appreciate you sending me an email about the running balance. I am not sure what you mean exactly. Regards,-mikhail.

content: Simply functional, been using for years. Superb.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: My favorite budgeting app for keeping a running total of my checking account and predicting its future amount. Not 5 🌟 because I wish it was visually updated to look more modern. It looks 20 years old.
replyContent:
Thank you Kyle.
The application is "only" 15 years old. :-)
Regards, -mikhail.

content: Love this app! I tried different ones before adopting this one. The only flaw is that i would like to be able to go back in history and it only goes back a few months.
replyContent:
Thank you Anissa.
You should be able to see all the past transaction. In the Settings, enable "Unlimited History".
regards, -mikhail.

content: Had few issues but waiting to see if resolved
replyContent: Sorry for the troubles This is unusual. Please send me a detailed email: do you save to google drive or device? what error you get, include screen shots, etc. The email is on the bottom of this page https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ca.mishell.budget or via the app: App Menu -> About -> CONTACT US. regards, -mikhail.

content: Been using this app for almost 2years, I was out of control in spending my money before. But the moment I track down my expenses, I realize how much money I was wasting. You should buy this app if you want to improve your money management skill! Thanks developer:)
replyContent: Thank you very much!

content: Still using this app and loving it, 4 years later!
replyContent: Great!

content: great app. need to change phones is this iphone compatible?
replyContent: Thank you. Unfortunately there is no iOS version.

content: Simple, user friend, low resources, intuitive. re-occuring expenses, easy to the eye, great planner, not a subscription, visual I am an engineer and I have developed my own Excels with similar functions (inputs & outputs). Even though my tool is great, this is even better because someone else is constantly improving it and fixing bugs. Also, my wife will use this over an excel.
replyContent: Thank you! It is great to hear such a positive assessment from an engineer which has a similar tool on their own!

content: The Best Budget App. It's easy to use. I use it daily. Convenient to have on my phone to keep track of incoming and outgoing.
replyContent: Thank you Jennifer!

content: I cant remember life before this app. I refer to it on a daily basis to check that I am on track for the month as well as inputting future as hoc payment events (e.g. holiday spending money) to ensure that I don't end up using those funds for something else. I therefore can use the app to plan additional events throughout the coming months and years and feel comfortable that have not over stretched my budget. This app really has revolutionised the way I manage my money, thankyou developers!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Works good. Needs custom icons to make it a 5 star app.
replyContent:
Thank you Brian.
There is a way to add custom icons. Please send me an email. I will provide the details. 
regards, -mikhail.

content: This is the only money app that makes sense.
replyContent: It makes sense :-) Thank you very much!

content: Does what you would expect and has kept me on time for all my bills for over 2 years now.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Well worth its price. Could use some improvement with cloud saving so that it continuously saves and loads from Google drive. I wish it was possible to clearly differentiate between debit accounts and credit since most of my bills to on credit cards and don't really make my balance drop, when I add the credit card payment it effectively reduces my available cash twice. I work around it by setting a credit card payment equal to the interest instead of the actual payment I do.
replyContent: Remy, thank you very much for your review and feedback. You are correct, Budget Calendar is not a banking app :-). Please send me an email, I may be able to recommend a way to emulate multiple accounts. Regards, -mikhail.

content: Fantastic App, couldn't manage my finances without it to be honest. Only 1 small glitch, when you manually adjust a balance then you cant add another purchase on the same day as it won't calculate the purchase and affect your end balance.
replyContent: Thank you Dave. I see your point. I can put a dialog to adjust the balance on the same day where a transaction amount is adjusted. The question is how far in advance I should check? What if there are more than one balance adjustment?  If you have a chance please send me an email via the app 's 'contact us'. Regards, -mikhail.

content: Great app, used it for years. I would not be without it.
I have used this app for years, couldn't have managed my finances as well without the handy forecasts to show me where my shortfalls were, makes meeting my pmts on time so easy.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Awesome...does everything i need...plus more
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: I have no idea how I made financial decisions before this app. It's changed the way I live and prevented me from overspending time after time. I love it!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: This app is invaluable, without it, managing my finances would be much more difficult and stressful, it has the flexibility and utility to allow for any number of changes or unforseen circumstances which would occur with your finances and I would and have highly recommended it to friends and family. Also, an edit: The most useful thing about this app? It's the calander and the icons available for each transaction, I can find no other app that has this, it's so simple yet so very effective.
replyContent: Thank you very much James!

content: After over 5 yrs using YNAB I finally dropped them, they used to have a similar desktop app that links to smartphone app, but now it's only a web online that links to smartphone with limited capabilities. I do have a question, what is the best way to sync this thru Google Drive. I have both the Budget Calendar Software and the Android App. Desktop Version, I have to end up saving to a local file then uploading to Google Drive, there is no sync option on the desktop version. Then on Android, I look for the file from google drive, sometimes it doesn't appear so I end up downloading from google drive to the phone's local storage and load from there, vice versa on both after I make changes, I save to local and upload to google, only to be downloaded. Where is the sync option on both Desktop and Android versions? I will also post this question on the Desktop Software website... Please help....
replyContent:
James, I responded via email. In case you didn't get it. Please follow this procedure https://www.mishell.ca/docs/google-drive-sharing.html
regards, -mikhail.

content: I have purchased and used expensive and complicated budget software and it has served me well, but my wife found it a little daunting. With Budget Calendar I can keep track of my finances just as well as the expensive software with a much simpler and easy to use interface. My wife likes it as well.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! Best Friday ever :-)

content: I've been using this for years now and it's been instrumental in my day to day budgeting. Once you get used to the interface, how to add and remove items etc it's easy to use and a solid performer.
replyContent: Great assessment! Thanks.

content: Can't live without it.
replyContent: Thank you. This is music to my ears :-)

content: Great budgeting app and the developer is very quick to respond and resolve any issue you may have.
replyContent: Thank you Kevin!

content: Guys really, I'm on the verge of tears about this app. This is exactly what I've been looking for. YNAB is missing something for me, and this is it. It cost five bucks and it's allowed me to figure out how to fill my buffer within a few months, even if we screw up a little. I have a beautiful aerial overview of my finances and I am so grateful. You don't even know! Thank you! Update: I'm still using this app at least every week. It is indispensable. I can't do bills without it. Thank you!
replyContent: Thank you very much W B!

content: I asked 2 years ago but would this app be available to use with apple products??
replyContent: Ashley, I appreciate that you like Budget Calendar. I am very sorry, there won't be an iOS version. :-( The cost of development is even higher now days. regards, - mikhail

content: Absolutely awesome program. One of the easiest and most complete budgeting software you can find!
replyContent: Thank you Roger! It is a great pleasure to hear such a nice opinion! Best regards, -mikhail

content: Best budget calendar app! It keeps me right in line with my budget and I can predict how much money I will have on a certain day after paying bills.
replyContent: Thank you Rebecca!

content: simple. easy. accessible. I recommend this app to anyone looking to get a handle on their budget. no unnecessary frills. been using it for years now, use it weekly or more.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review Tamara!!

content: Been using for several years now. Highly recommend this app for helping maintain a budget!
replyContent:
Fredy, thank you so much for your review! 
"Several years" sounds like music to me :-) regards, -mikhai.

content: Good app.
replyContent: Thank you very much. Keep using our app :)

content: I love how easy it is to use! I love the fact that of u stick to ur budget you can see how much money u can save later down the road! and I love how u can make little adjustments if u end up spending more.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: I've been using this app since 2014 or so. It is exactly what I was looking for. I was previously using an actual paper calendar and notebook ledger to keep track of my finances. This app eliminated all of that and now i can take my finances with me to make sure i don't overspend accidentally. Would recommend this to anyone who likes to track their finances on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis. Only criticism is that i wish it had better icons for payments. Need a more diverse selection.
replyContent: Gregory, thank you very much for the kind words! You touched the “soft-spot” on the artwork. It is hard to get it, it is pricy to the point where app’s sales can’t cover the cost. However, just like in the desktop version you can add you own icons. Please send me an email, I’ll send the instructions. regards, -mikhail.

content: not good experince not user friendly ..I have purchased via credit card ..hope amount will refund
replyContent: Mayank, kindly send me an email with details on what you find not user friendly. Regards,-mikhail

content: Using this app for quite a while now, it's brilliant thanks!
replyContent: Thank you Debbie!

content: I love this app! It has been a great help to me. Is the app available for iOS?
replyContent: Thank you Nay! Unfortunately there is no iOS version. The cost of development for iOS is very high, the return is minute. Regards, -mikhail.

content: Everything works amazingly well, Love this app, Life Saver!!!!
replyContent: Thank you Tommy. Let me know if you run into problems. Regards, -mikhail

content: Game changer I have been using this app for years and have never had a problem. It's intuitive and so easy to use. It's like having a golden key for your financial picture. I can't imagine it ever receiving anything but 5 stars.
replyContent: Thank you Myles!

content: I love this app. But it has recently stopped backing up to Dropbox.
replyContent:
Kelly, Dropbox was *never* supported. It would be a Dropbox or an Android issue. In the past Dropbox happened to work with Budget, but the approach has changed and now Dropbox exports files as read-only. 
The only cloud storage supported is the Google Drive. 
regards, -mikhail.

content: Been using this app for 2 yrs and has been the best I have found! Simple and with actual reporting instead of pie and line charts. Know exactly where you are at all times with money. Highly recommend!!!
replyContent: Thank you very much Gene!

content: I've been using this for a few years. It really helps me to project forward with my spend and ensure that I have budgeted correctly. I'm on a 4 weekly pay cycle and managing monthly direct debits was such a pain. Using this tool has meant I can easily see what my day to day finances are like.
replyContent: Thank you Ian.

content: With the most recent update I'm having issues with saving. Sometimes my data gets lost. Please fix to return to a full 5 star rating.
replyContent: Ruben,  any improvements since the latest updates of google drive?  Regards, -mikhail

content: very easy to use and understand great app
replyContent: Thank you!

content: great way to plan and stay on track
replyContent: Thank you Rodney!

content: very easy to use. the calendar with a running balance is great. i would be worth it to me to buy this app again for my spouses phone if there was a way we could both access and make real time updates.
replyContent: Thank you Ryan. Real time updates are very difficult to implement. There would be a need for a server for data storage, security, safety, etc. However, sharing via Google drive works well, other than simultaneously using the same file. Regards,-mikhail

content: Good app for budgeting. However, I paid for the Android app because I wanted to be able to sync it to the computer version like it says I can. Turns out that the PC version cost $30 in addition to the $5 for the app. No syncing available on the trial version on PC. I'd like a refund.
replyContent: Tyson, Mobile and Desktop can and do work independently, no need purchase both, unless you want to. Sync should be working in the trial, please send me a email about the problem. The email is on the bottom of the description page. Regards, -mikhail

content: Keeps me on track getting myself out of debt. Fantastic features & options to use. I use it on my tablet or phone without any problems
replyContent: Thank you!

content: I used to write my budget out daily for months at a time and this has been a simplified version with much less eraser marks.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: So far Brilliant 😁 only issue is it works for 1 account only. Can you have more than 1 app at the same time? Would be great if you could use the same setup but go between accounts. Would be happy to pay per account added.
replyContent: Thank you! The app's main goal is payment planning. It looks at your entire finances as a whole. It can be used for micro-management (think of a banking ledger) but it is not designed for "fine" tracking. You can create a new data .bgt files for each of your accounts, or put all transactions for all accounts into one file. regards, -mikhail.

content: I think this app is made up of fake reviews. For what it cost. This app is primitive and unclear. The app style is old and clunky. I have since found a free, streamlined, modern app which intuitive functionality.
replyContent: Francesca, it is disheartening to get a review like this. I put an effort to build a simple and intuitive app. I’d appreciate you describing in detail which parts of the app you found unclear, here or email. There is a desktop tutorial  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9IFyxpW6mZ8 but it is the same for Android. Regards, -mikhail.

content: I have been using this product since 2010 when it was only available as computer software and I'm beyond thrilled that it now has an app! I have tried dozens of other budgeting apps trying to get one with similar features on my phone only to be let down. This calendar-based budgeting system has saved me untold amounts in bank fees because I can look ahead and know what my balance will be on any particular day in the future. It takes into consideration that payments are due on different days throughout the month and allows you to plan accordingly. And now I don't have to even open my laptop to get to it! I'm so excited!! Also, I've had to contact the developer a couple times when I upgraded to a new computer and the customer service has been top notch each time. Thank you so much for the past 8 years of budget help and hopefully many more in the future!
replyContent: Thank you,  thank you,  thank you! 😊

content: I love this app I'm very bad at budgeting and keeping track of my reoccurring payments. This app helps so much and is easy to use. It even shows you a future forecast based on your income v.s your expenses.

Liked the setup, just how I have a spreadsheet I use and maintain for my expense tracking with my wife. Only downside for me is that I can not add a second account. Wife and I have two different bank accounts and it'd be great to be able to have to different accounts within the same budget rather than just one account
replyContent: Hello, the main design goal is to avoid micromanagement, thus there is no concept of accounts. Budget looks at the finances as a whole, however you can emulate multiple accounts (to a degree) by having more than one budget data file. Regards, -mikhail.

content: Really keeps me on track, really easy to use. Love it. The only negative is the free one doesn't save enough information so I had to pay to upgrade. It wasn't too expensive and I do use it every day so it was worth it.
replyContent: Thank you Wendy! I am curious how long did you use the trial version...

content: I have had this app for many years and love the format. I never take time to write reviews for things but thought this app was worth it.
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time! Thank you for the kind words.

content: I can't begin to tell you how much this app has helped me get my finances under control. After a divorce and being self employed and getting paid three times a week, things got messy. The way this app is designed and laid out made it super easy to get back on track. Knowing what I know now, I would have paid way more than I did for this app.
replyContent: Thank you! It is very rewarding to hear that design goals of Budget Calendar are achieved. Regards, -mikhail

content:
Wow! I came back just to praise this app. So awesome I would pay for this 
app. Thank you guys
replyContent: Thank you!

content: The best budgeting app ever! Worth every penny it costs to purchase!
replyContent: Thank you very much Cyril!

content: This app (and the associated desktop version) was EXACTLY what I was looking for. It has the calendar feature and rolling balance that I wanted but could never find in any of the other apps including MINT.   Previously, I have been using a EXCEL spreadsheet that literally did the same thing as this app but input and management of it was very much a very manual process.   This application simplifies that whole process now that I can just use the desktop app and the mobile app together (I recommend buying both,  very worth the cost).    I like that the desktop app and mobile app can utilize the same file and and I can share these files via cloud sharing (Google Drive for me).   Easy to setup 1 time or recurring bills and payments as well as income. You see your balance every day as well as balance forecasts for weeks and months to follow.  Easy projection and reporting. Very useful app.
replyContent: Willie, thank you very much! You described very precisely the design goals of Budget Calendar. I really appreciate your review. Regards, Mikhail

content:
Love love love this app. Its exactly what I have been looking for, for over 
a year! Thank you for taking the time and attention to develop such a great 
and user friendly and intuitive product. Worth every penny. I now can see 
what days EXACTLY I can make payments towards debt to help manage our 
account. THANK YOU!!!
replyContent: Thank you Ashley!

content:
I love the app. Love that I can save to Google drive and share between my 
devices!
replyContent: Thank you Rachel!

content: Great app really helpful, shame about the pc version scam.(pay again)
replyContent: Scott, I don't know why you say that pc version is a scam.  You don't have to purchase both. Mobile version is a complete app. These apps come from different market places, thus the separation. Regards, Mikhail.

content: With a little bit more effort on my part I was able to utilize Google drive to sync the app between my mobile and PC.  Works nicely and I find this calendar approach to budgeting the most effective method.
replyContent: Thank you very much Tom! regards, - mikhail

content: Love the app. Would be cool if we could link it to our bank account so every time we make a purchase it automatically goes into the calendar.
replyContent: Thank you very much! On the banking, I tried this with the desktop version -  IMO  it didn't work well . I ended up with micromanagement. This app is primarily for macro management. Regards, - mikhail

content: I have tried several similar apps. While some of them did most of what I wanted none can match budget calendar. Very easy to set up and enter expenses and deposits. Quick feedback of where your money is going each month. I use it daily.
replyContent: Thank you Kurt!

content: My wife and I have been doing budgets every three months by printing off and spending several hours each month recalculating to make sure we were on track. Not only does it save paper for us, but the time of needing to go back through every month and re-adjusting numbers to figure out what we could put away to savings. This app is exactly what we've been waiting for.
replyContent: Thank you very so much Christopher! You outlined the exact design goals of the APP! Happy budgeting! regards, -mikhail.

content: After trying several budget planning apps, I found this one. Its features are exactly what I need. The best part is glancing at a month and seeing my future balances for each day. Also, the developers are very helpful if you have questions.
replyContent: Thank you!  I am glad the workaround did its thing.

content: This app and the Desktop version are worth every penny!
replyContent: Thank you very much Sir!

content: I'm very surprised that my bank and mint doesn't offer something this comprehensive. However, this app is very good and its worth every penny. If it could somehow be integrated into my Google calendar so I can see nonfinancial events and my budget all in the same place, I would be very happy.  Lost one star because the desktop version isn't as well integrated as I would like and I have to pay for them separately. I paid for the phone one, I don't really want to pay for the desktop one too. Registration should work with both!
replyContent: Phil, Thank you for your review. Regards, - mikhail

content: Love it! My favorite app, absolutely worth it.
replyContent: Thank you Joey!

content: I love budget calendar. I bought the pc download 8 years ago and used it ever since. I was so excited to see it as an app for my phone. I recommend it to everyone I know. It helps me visualize not just the month but the whole year. Add a new car payment or increase rent and I get an idea of how it will affect my savings and cash flow.
replyContent: Thank you very much Stacie!

content: Absolutely love this app! It's taken me from just scraping by to having a constant amount of wiggle room in my budget. Fantastic display so you can see everything in a calendar view.  My only suggestion would be to have an "undo last change" feature. I've been known to alter entire historical transactions instead of future transactions only, and many a time I've deleted something I shouldn't have! User error for sure!
replyContent: Thank you Jennifer! The UNDO -- point taken. I have to review the internals.

content: The app is nice if you use only your checking account. I prefer an app that let's me add all the  credit cards. How can I receive my refund?
replyContent: Alexandra, Budget Calendar is not a thought to be a banking application, it doesn’t have concept of “account”, although you can simulate it to some degree by having multiple data files, which this app allows. Regards, -mikhail

content: I can't live without this app! Have used computer program and phone app. Easy to use and excellent fast support. ♥️♥️♥️♥️
replyContent: Thank you very much Judy!

content: Been using the desktop software for several years... since nearly the first release. Love it. The app is great, however sync only works with Google Drive, not DropBox (is a Dropbox/Android issue). Developer is always helpful when needed. I continue to recommend this software for home budget needs!
replyContent: Thank you Robert!

content: Why are my .bgt  files supposedly read only? Can't make changes to my file anymore. Pc says file has read and write permission
replyContent: Steven, please share the details on how you open files. Please note the is a known issue with the Dropbox on some Samsungs android 7 versions. It marks files read only. Please send me an email with details. The email is on the bottom of the app's page in Google play. Regards, - mikhail

content: I bought the full version. And eversince this app is my go to in checking my financial status. When i want to buy something expensive on a certain day i would just check the date and see my balance for that day wether negative or positive. It also motivates me when i have a goal on how much i would want to save and seeing by which month will i aim that. :)
replyContent: Thank you Patricia!

content: I LOVE this app!! I have been using the PC based program for years, have had to contact Mikhail for support only once 3 years ago, still have his reply with my product code in my inbox, lol.  I spent months combing for the best budget tool for me & this is precisely what I had in mind and was looking for. I know exactly where all my dollars go and a real-time WHEN (a part most budget apps miss!!
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Just what I was looking for!  This app is simple and does everything I need.  It shows actual cash flow on a calendar instead of just adding up a monthly budget like most apps I tried.

I like the app. My complaint is that it doesn't seem to back itself up or I don't know how to. I had to get a new phone and I was budgeted for at least 6 months to try to pay off a credit card. I transferred my aim card and SD card into my new phone but my calendar didn't transfer. Had to start from scratch.  :(
replyContent: Nicole, Budget Calendar does not store data on the cloud by default. The files are saved in the app's storage. Please follow the procedure of sharing http://mishell.ca/contact.html, search for "How do I share my budget data files between devices?" . Regards, - mikhail

content: Good application
replyContent: Thank you.

content: Started using a couple weeks ago and its fantastic! Thank you for such a helpful program.

Update: It's now been around 6 years we've been using Mikhail's Calendar and it's still the 1st app I install on new phone/laptop/tablet. Thank you.  I've been using this for years on my home laptop and it's been invaluable to us keeping on top of our finances. Cannot praise enough. The app is just as good, dare I say even better due to it's portability. And with cloud storage I can update my home sheet with my app data without having to re-enter everything. Very good for keeping track whilst out an about. I thank you, brilliant app.
replyContent: David, Thank you so much for a heart warming review! I am happy to hear that my app hits the spot for you!  Regards , - mikhail

content: I love this app. Saves me so much time for balancing our finances. The creator is also very responsive to questions I have had in the past.  Is there a way to sync the data between 2 devices so my husband can see the same thing on his phone as what I have on mine?
replyContent:
Lindsey, please see " How do I share my budget data files between devices?" on http://mishell.ca/contact.html
Regards, - mikhail

content: Best app by far for budgeting. I know where all my funds are going and very easy to use. My compliments to the developer
replyContent: Thank you Sir!

content: Really  like this app but can I save the database externally incase I upgrade or change my phone I do t really want to input all the data in again?
replyContent: Hello, can save data on the "external" storage and Google Drive. Click on your file in the File Dialog and see the options. The external is /download -  you will be able for backup from there. Regards, - mikhail

content: For some reason since got the new s8 it no longer works won't open from drop box still getting msg saying file is corrupt it used to work great and loved it
replyContent: Robert, this  a dropbox issue on S8 and S7 on Android 7. Unfortunately  I can't fix it. Samsung or Dropbox should. I recommend to switch to Google Drive while this gets resolved. Regards, - mikhail

content: So far so good. Would love some widget options
replyContent: Shawn, I can not give you a time line yet, but I am considering a widget. Regards, - mikhail

content: My personal favourite one. Absolutely worth the money!
replyContent: Thank you!

content: My Samsung 7 has just updated and I cannot access My Budget ? Receive message saying file is corrupt?
replyContent: Beverly, are you using Dropbox for storage? If yes, there is a bug in Dropbox. Please send me an email with details. Regards, - mikhail

content: I totally love this app. It's a lifesaver. I know if I'm on tight buget for the next month.. I can tell by budget calender, what my expenses for this month and the following month. I can see if I got extra money to spend or not to spend if I got budget or no budget at all. Seeing from the calendar I know what I spends and will spends for the next following months.

We love this app. It allows us to be able to truly track our budget with ease. The only problem is it is not available for apple phones that I am aware of. Is there any plans in the near future. We just haven't found any thing else like it.
replyContent: Thank you Cara. Unfortunately, as you pointed out, there is no iOS version. There is no plan to have one -- the cost of development for iOS is high, and the return is not.

content: I really do like this money app as I like seeing what money is left in my a/c as well my expenses. I'm using this app daily which I didn't do with my other money manager apps. I bought the premium version and consider it money well spent.  Some suggestions: I'd like the icons I use often to be at the top of the icons as it can be hard to see them every time I need them. I'm unsure if this app does a pie chart on where my money goes every month and would welcome this feature. This may not be something you'd consider, but I'd also like a grocery section where I could compile my list and then input price of each product and thereafter know what shop is cheaper for bread, milk etc.  Thanks for making this app.
replyContent: Thank you Fiona. The per category/item dialog is available. It is not a pie chart -- it is %. App Menu, Stats. I'll think about sorting icons on per use basis. On the groceries list -- I am afraid my application is not designed for this. Regards, -mikhail.

content: I have been using the desktop version of this program for years and it's the reason I have managed my money so effectively.  A visual calendar shows you your cash flow yesterday, today and in the future.  SO worth the money. An easy FIVE stars... Still 5 stars May 2017
replyContent: Thank you very much!

content: This app has helped me to visualize my budget in a way that no other app or finance program has been able to do.  I used it to help forecast my accounts and bills to the date and penny, and set up a specific amount to be direct deposited​ each week and auto pay for all my bills, with the remainder of my pay going to a secondary checking account for 'discretionary spending' for things like gas, food, etc.   Now I always know if I can afford things, my bills are always paid on time without any action by me, and goals are much easier to set and achieve. Without a doubt this is the most useful tool in my financial toolbox right now.
replyContent: Thank you Eric!

content: This is an awesome app.  It has saved my sanity.  It is what I have tried to program excel to do only 100 times better.  I use it on my tablet.  My only request is that it be easier to transfer to my phone, or better yet, was automatically synchronized like many other apps.   Good job.
replyContent: Hello, multiple devices are supported. Copy or move your budget files into google drive or dropbox. Wait to sync to other devices and open from there. Please note -- simultaneous editing of the same data file is not supported. The last device to save will prevail. regards, -mikhail.

content: Perfect!

Absolute best budgeting app I've ever come across. Keeps a daily running balance like no app I've been able to find. Makes budgeting and checkbook balancing a breeze. I would recommend this app to anybody that wants to stay financially aware of their bills and account balance. Incredibly easy layout and tons of statistic records and reports. Take about an hour to play around and explore the app and you have it figured out. Modifications are easy. Again, HIGHLY recommend.
replyContent: Thank you very much Jesse!

content: Just like my Excel budget. Easiest budget app!  I just wish there was an option for multiple budgets. I have a few things I need to track separately. **** UPDATE!!!  10☆ APP!! Same day response from Mikhail about how to have multiple budget files. PERFECTION!
replyContent: Thank you Jill. You can have many Budget files. Open the File Dialog and click on the 'NEW' button. Regards, - mikhail

content: Best budgeting ph app. Used it since it was developed. Never found anything better. Full integration with desktop version
replyContent: Thank you!

content: This is the best app I have came across for budgeting finances(I have tried a lot too).  I used to use this same method of projecting money on a paper calendar so the software is very intuitive. Worth every penny. Great job on the app.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Updated review... Have been using this for a couple of years now and it has changed my life financially. Have it synced with Google Drive to use with the PC version. Hasn't let me down yet. Thanks.
This is a really good app, i love it. Thank you for making this, it helps me a lot with my budgeting.
Easy to use and AMAZING customer service. I had an issue ( turned out to be my phone) and Mikhail sorted it out so fast!!!! Thank you
replyContent: Amanda, thank you for help in debugging the issue. regards, -mikhail.

content: It works just like I think. I have been doing this method for years. This is the best implementation I have found.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Exactly what I have been looking for.
Needs visual reports
replyContent: Thank you for the review. Could you please send me an email with details on what you would like to see in the "visual reports" ? Regards, -mikhail

content: Got this cuz I thought it would be really easy but it's not. Really tried to figure out how to adjust balances but I was unable to figure this program out.
replyContent: Judy, clicking on the day in the calendar. Click on the 'balance' or the amount. This opens a menu, the top item is the 'adjust balance'. Regards, - mikhail

content: This app is simple to use, easy to navigate and helpful!!! Highly recommend because im useless at saving!

This app makes planning my budget so easy! The graphs are helpful, especially the min balance by month, which helps me plan ahead for those times when all the bills happen to come in the same week. For example, say my rent, gas and electric are all due in the same week. I can see my balance drop in the red next month and start saving now to make sure I have enough. I can even see the day I go below zero, so maybe borrow some money just in time and I can give the exact date I can repay. How good is that!
Best budgeting app out very simple to set and useful when money is tight what bills can get moved around

This is the best budgeting app I've found for people that get paid biweekly and need to account for when bills are due. I have recently been having trouble with saving though. I update the budget and it says it saves, but when I go back to look the changes have disappeared. Please help!
replyContent:
** HOW TO RESOLVE DRIVE SAVE/LOAD ISSUES **

1. Update Budget Calendar and Budget Calendar Lite (if you use it) to the latest versions.

2. On the device: Settings->Apps->Google Play Services->Storage -> Clear Cache and Clear [All] Data.

(please note that the "Google Play Services" needs cache cleaning not the Budget Calendar app)

***

content: As a visual person with  simple budgeting needs, I found all other apps were more than I needed and convoluted. Budget Calendar fits my needs perfectly. I set up an expenses and a savings calendar. Each performs exactly as I want, especially showing long term results.  One option I would use if available; have  static/estimated/actual option. Ex: mortgage is the same every month but utilities fluctuate like water/gas. I estimate to budget then would like to change to actual when bill arrives. Thank you!
Used the PC program for long time.   Got quick and helpful responses from developer when needed.  Now I love the mobile app too.
I have used this for several years, I tried others and none of them compare. Easy to set up and use, and the customer service is prompt (I misplaced my Code when I switched computers)

I've been using this app at least a year now. I love it. Its really simple to use. At a glance I see my monthly bills coming up and know what my balance will be after those are paid. Easy to make adjustments to fluctuating income due to overtime. Easy to sum up all my misc' expenses and deduct them all at once by simply adjusting the current balance rather than needing to categorize things. I tell everybody.
Awesome
I am trying to make a $150 transaction for the 1st and 15th of every month towards the payment of a car. There is probably a simple solution to this, but how do I do it? Thank you.
replyContent:
Melisa,

1. Create a payment starting on the first of the month. Make it "pay every 1 month" 

2. Duplicate the payment, then go to the payment and adjust the starting day to the 15th. You can also adust the payment description, I'd make it the same as the one on the first. 

Regards, -mikhail.

content: Went to bank site, wrote down all transactions for the last 3 weeks (two pages worth) typed in every one. Skipped over to pay credit card bill, came back and it's all gone. Every last entry.
replyContent: Marilyn, I would like to help you resolve this issues. I am not certain what exactly is gone. Could you please send me a detailed email? The link to the email is on the bottom of the page. Regards, -mikhail.

content: I have used the PC version for many many years and bought the app when it first came out. I use this exclusively, it's exactly what I wanted.

6/30 I thought the app was a work of perfection. It's 7/2 and it won't save a thing no matter how many times I try. 7/5 looks like the inability to save was due to the upgrade from lite to the full version. When I backed up my file to google drive I ran the file from there causing it not to save anymore after a while. The process of upgrading the app should just pull the file over otherwise the app is perfect.
replyContent: Michael,  please send me a detailed email.  Please put as much details as possible and screenshots.  Where do you save to? In particular I am interested in the 'File' dialog screenshot. BTW to cause an immediate 'save', open file dialog from the app menu.  Regards, - mikhail

content: Love this app. This is exactly what I have been using on paper and also a complicated excel spreadsheet for years and I'm glad I found this. Makes future budgeting really easy. I like that you can set up recurring transactions but edit specific entries without affecting every one. The ability to easily move entries is great too. Good job, worth the $.
No se salva nada de.lo que introdusco yo lo compre no se.que pasa pero no esta vien
replyContent: Could you please send me an email with details, such as errors, what doesn't save, where? screen shots of the errors? Regards, -mikhail.

content: I like the app but I wish two things,- my salary goes in on the last Friday of the month and my wife's salary goes in on 27th of every month, how can I do this on app? Shame it can't link to my account and show live balance!
replyContent:
Andy, currently Budget Calendar doesn't support 'last Friday' scheduling option. This may be suitable: setup your transactions to start on the 31st of a months, this will put transactions on the last day of any months.
Please email me details of 'link to my account' -- I am not sure what this means. Regards, -mikhail.

content: The best budget app !!!
Needs to have a quick transaction widget. Also make it easier to switch between files. Otherwise great!!!!
The only thing this needs is a home screen widget
So nice to see everything at once on the calendar. Makes it so much easier to keep track.
This app has changed my financial life!!! Best $5 I have ever spent! My friends love it, too. I'm telling everyone I know about Budget Calendar!!
Super easy and efficient, you won't be disappointed.
Would have got 5 stars if it allowed for multiple currencies and a selectable base currency with a user defined exchange rate.
replyContent: Sarosh you can define your currency. In the Settings there is a prefix or/and suffix. Regards, -mikhail.

content: This is exactly what I was looking for!!

Loving this app so far. Only using it on my phone, but wondering if my husband gets the same app on his phone how do I sync it? I deal with the finances, but would like him to know what's going on too. Thanks
replyContent: Claire, sync between devices by using Dropbox or Google Drive. Important note: simultaneous *editing* of the same budget file is not recommended. The last device to save is going to prevail. Regards, -mikhail.

content: Have been using this app for over a year now. Brilliant.

Just purchased this app a few minutes ago. So far it's pretty awesome. However I'm wondering if there's a way I can add a second calendar since I'd like to keep track of two separate accounts.   Update: I figured out how to add a second calendar (account) by starting a new file. This app is great! Keep up the great work! Can't wait to try out the desktop version.

This app is saving my money and my life. Brilliant running, last update was created after I had a problem running, developer contacted me and fixed it! Brilliant service. By far the best I've encountered on the play store.
replyContent: Jordan, I had some issues with the soft keyboard, but not this kind (yet?). Could you please send me a screenshot and the exact procedure to reproduce this? regards, -mikhail.

content: Exactly what I was looking for! Simple and straightforward, with a running daily balance!
Best budgeting app ever, you can easily see your day to day balance, upcoming payments, no more pen and paper :)
The only problem is im having a hard time figure out how to borrow from savings so i dont have to manually adjust the amount.
replyContent: Joshua, for some reason I can't post my full reply. Could you please send me an email -- I will reply to it. Regards, -mikhail.

content: I only screwed up the saving of my budget once with the phone app but it's getting a lot better with Google drive. There's a specific way you have to open the file, but I'm getting it down. The PC version of this software has been a lifesaver, I love that I can now edit my budget on the fly with my phone now.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback.

content: This app does exactly what I've always wanted from a finance app. It shows me at a glance when my balance will be lowest so I can transfer money from savings if needed, or so I can tell when to make that big purchase that's not in the normal budget. With so many of my bills paid electronically on a schedule, this is a must for keeping track of cash flow.

When the app reloads the file from Google drive, most recent changes are being overwritten. Obviously not synchronising most recent changes for some reason, maybe add an option to force sync before exit/manually ?
replyContent: Tony, could you please email more details when this happens? I have not observed this problem, sometimes I see a lag when loading from the drive. Regards, -mikhail.

content: I was 15k in debt when I bought this app 2 yrs ago, this week I'm buying a house. True story.

This app is great for visualizing monthly payments and what to expect for your running balance.  Entering data is fairly simple and intuitive with the ability to define categories as you go.  There is also a companion (paid) program to run on your desktop.  I like that option. What I don't like is that the paid version of this app is not compatible with the Lite version's file.  Not cool!  Have to re-enter everything.  There's also no way to print or save info to a file for which I dropped the rating.
replyContent: Rich, the lite version is compatible with the paid. A budget file needs to be exported to an external location. This is done via the file dialog. Select the file on the internal storage. Click on it, and click on the 'move to external storage'. After that the file should appear in the paid version file dialog. Regards.

content: Best way to  keep myself on a budget.  I can  forecast months in advance  how much I can spend weekly.
Indispensable!
Input income and expenses on a calendar and see each day what's coming and going with easy ways to update as the days go by.  Or if you stick to your budget it keeps track of the math PERFECTLY

This budget app has the most useful feature I've ever found- cash flow information! Being able to see how much I WILL have once planned bills come out is so valuable and we have not had a bounced check since we got this app. Also, the ability to look at the STATS and see how much you spend in certain categories is very nice. Best app I ever bought.
Ive been looking for an app like this for years. Will never be without it!
Great app
I've used the desktop version four years.  Love the simplicity and the ease of use on this app.

I am deeply in love with this app! I only wish that you can look at multiple calendars at once, maybe an on and off box off to the side.                                      The only reason it's not a 5 star is I have to download dropbox to make the syncing work to my computer.  I hate dropbox.  It worked with Google drive at first then started crashing.  So FYI. You must use dropbox if you want to sync with other devices.

Usually I don't take the time of my day to write a review but after the need to find a good budget app and the amount of research compare to other namely Budget Calendar from Elite Platinum who wanted to charge web sync on 6m to 12m basis this app does it better too bad it does have multi account supported.  Also tried Dollar bird and found lack some feature I wanted to use.  This app give me everything I need and it sync via dropbox.  I can forecast my income/expense recurring from 1x day to week and month where other only allowed week and months.   Hope this review help someone who in need of really good budget app.

I have tried about 15 different budget apps, and this is by far the most user-friendly, straight-forward app I've ever used. I tried Quicken and it's just too much. I don't want over-complicated apps or programs that demand too much information. I just wanted a calendar which will allow me to see at a glance how much money I have now, and how much money I WILL have on any given day, as far into the future as I would like, at a glance.
I have been a desktop user for YEARS, and now that I have downloaded the APP and made them sync, I'm even more in love!
I'm not sure what I'd do without it.  I don't even keep a check register anymore. I love it
Great app. Simple to use. Haven't overspent a dime since I got it.

This is a great app that is helping me and my family handle our finances. To make it a superb app it would need a payment reminder function so that I need only enter my bill payments in the one place instead of having to re-enter them in my other calendar that does remind me when a payment is coming up.

It helps me keep track of my expenses and income with a daily balance. It is also great for forecast of future transactions or expenses.  It allows me to see how my bank account can look in future months. Will like to see my actual transfers to savings in the same page, not like a negative on my account.
This is a great app!  Keeps me on track so I know where I am so I do not spend what I'm not suppose to.
Is it possible to notify of up coming bills though
I had it on PC. Not dispointed at all.
As a very happy user of the PC version, I'm so pleased the android app doesn't disappoint.  It's excellent.  Well done.
A notification reminder would be a plus. Easy to use.
Makes budgeting and cash forecasting straight forward and easy
All of the popular budget sites/apps were too complicated, or needed to sync with bank data... This is just what I wanted, an income and bills calendar :)
I can't seem to get my exported budget to load on any other devices; the app keeps telling me it can't load anything that isn't a file.  Otherwise, it's perfect.
replyContent: Kevin, run budget calendar on the desktop, the window title bar shows the full path to the data file. This is the file to copy to a dropbox folder -- wait for dropbox to sync. You should be able to open on your mobile device(s). Regards, -mikhail.

content: I've never had a late payment after purchasing this app. One-time charge, no monthly fees. Perfect.
Let's work on the Icon next.
I love it would like to be able to show savings and credit cards because now when I transfer money to savings it shows paying out and the reverse shows as income all and all still very good
This is original app & features. Very easy to use shows you day to day amount.
Be a 5 star if could run additional accounts. Example savings visa and super accounts.
Great for automatic payments, but one time purchases a little confusing.
Can't do without
Perfectly simple
A wonderful app to help keep my monthly budget on track.
Great way to track your bills I'm one of those people that needs a calendar to see what I have left over with a forecast and this app does just

This is the best app that you can. Get for budget the learning curve is slightly harder but support to help is great. Once you grasp this app will become a breeze and offers everything you want. The only addition that should be added is notifications for bills due that would be great.

Brilliant app to sort your money out.tried loads but this is clearly the best.all your months spending and balance right in front of you at a glance. Very easy to edit figures and change data.top job !
I've never been motivated to budget until now.  I LOVE this app!!!
I have been using the desktop version for years.  I was so happy to see that there is an app now.  Thank you!
Cannot figure out how to post weekly income. Only letting me use transactions but not letting me add salary
replyContent:
Double touch a day cell where you want to add the first transaction of a payment.
Select ''add a new payment" menu item, fill up the payment details: description, amount, image, how often paid, etc.
Did you watch the tutorial video on youtube? It is for the desktop, but mobile is very similar:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9IFyxpW6mZ8

content: Couldn't find the Desktop version, Resolution was not fit for my screen and couldn't get a refund! waste of money!
replyContent:
Susu, 

1. The desktop version is at http://www.mishell.ca/ just like the link says
2. The recommended resolution is 480x800, it is indicated in the description of the product. What is your resoltion?
3. I am guessing you missed the 15 minute window to get a full refund? Who did you ask about the refund?

content: I had this for pc before it was an app. It was hard for me to keep track of my finances because of the amount of transactions I would make. Now I can easily get a "real" balance , I use it just about daily. No more over drafts or late bill payments.

Exactly what I was looking for. I use in conjunction with Mint, this app for the forecasting and Mint to watch where my money is going. So far my only gripe is that when you adjust your balance, the typing keyboard appears instead of the number pad. Small but worth mentioning. Everything else works well and is very intuitive. Also, it requires far fewer permissions than another app I tried that was not nearly as good.

Bar and pie graphs just don't work well for me, but seeing all of our income and expenses applied to a calendar makes it so easy for me to anticipate issues in advance! With this app I can sit down and, if necessary, move bills around a bit to keep our balance more, well, balanced. It's also incredibly helpful because I can see exactly how much disposable income we have on any given day, and I can plug in discretionary expenses and then scroll forward to see the effect those expenses will have on the budget in the coming weeks. It's easy to see high and low balances for each month since they're highlighted in yellow (low) and purple (high) each month, which gives me an even better overall picture of our finances from month to month. This has truly been a lifesaver, and I'm so glad I found it! An added bonus is the desktop version, which can be easily synced using Dropbox.
Been using the desktop version for years and loving the android app!

I've tried a few budget planners for android and this is by far the best. Easy to enter and amend them payments. Ability to adjust the account balance and mark payment status. Calendar display is perfect for keeping control of your budget and good month on month reports.

This is a great app. I use it on my tablet without any problems. I like that I can see when my bills are due and the balance on a particular day. I only wish that I could add payments quarterly or every other month.
replyContent: The frequency of recurring payments is adjustable. In the Payment Edit dialog, scroll down to 'Pay Every' section. On the top of this section there is a number box. Edit it. Put "2" and check 'Month' to get the desired "every other month".

content: The forecasting its what makes this app excellent
I was so excited to find this app! This is the only way I've ever been able to manage my finances and have always had to manually create an excel spreadsheet.
This is the best personal finance app I have ever used. Incredibly easy to record and edit transactions. Crucially, it shows you if you can survive until the next payday.

If you are on a regular fixed income and have regular bills this is perfect. You set up how you get paid: weekly, biweekly, monthly. And set up your bills. Once done you can see your balance and if there is any upcoming trouble or how much you can set aside for savings or fun. I was using excel for this now I'm in love with the app.
Awesome app! I have been using desktop version for couple of years.

Great addition to desktop version of this app which we've been using for over two years to help manage our budget. Its great to have my wife be able to use her phone to check on our upcoming available funds when it really matters (when she's out shopping, BEFORE she spends the money).  My only dislike about it is that there doesn't seem to be a way to customize the highlight colors like there is on the desktop version.  I like to use red to highlight the lowest projected balance for the month (default on this app is yellow) and green for the highest (default on this app is purple) and for the background color of the current day to be a slightly darker shade of blue that is used to highlight passed days (default on this app is light tan)
I've been using this app on my windows pc for almost a year now and love it. Thanks for developing an android app so I can take it on the road. Great app.

I have used the Mac and PC version for several years. The new phone app is great.  I pull the file from my dropbox account so all devices can access the same file. I had a problem and contacted the developer. He responded immediately. It turns out it was my error (I opened an old file).  I definitely recommend the software and this app.
I used the PC version for many years. So happy to see it on Android platform. It's a great program.
It's all in the title can't find a fault it's perfect. The only thing I would like to see is back up to external sd card
I have been using the PC version for a good few years now. Now it out as an app this is great news thank you so much.
This is truly the best app to budget and plan. Dont fall for all the hype with the others. This is very similar to ace money.
Have used for years and years now.
I've been using this calendar on my desktop for years now. So glad I have it on my phone now. Obsessed!!

I've been using the desktop version of this app for many years now because nothing else has ever come nearly so close to what I want in a budgeting tool than Budget Calendar. I was delighted to discover the Android version and immediately installed it. Bringing my budgets with me on the go is well worth the price.
Using it on Android and Ubuntu with pleasure. I give it 5 stars.

Just what I've been looking for.  I have also added this program to my home PC.  I give 5stars even though it can use a couple updates such as, a widget and options to use my note pen..  Overall this is the perfect budget calendar
I have been using desktop version for 2 years.   I'm very happy to see this little app come along.  It helps me forecast my cash flow in a very visual way.  Not sure for everyone but I love it.
